chat_welcome_message: Hi, how may I help you?
head_html:
<!-- Google Fonts -->
<link as="style" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Raleway:300,300i,400,400i,600,600i,700,700i|Roboto:300,300i,400,400i,500,500i,600,600i,700,700i|Poppins:300,300i,400,400i,500,500i,600,600i,700,700i" rel="stylesheet" />

<!-- Vendor CSS Files -->
<link as="style" href="assets/BizLand/assets/vendor/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
<link as="style" href="assets/BizLand/assets/vendor/icofont/icofont.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
<link as="style" href="assets/BizLand/assets/vendor/boxicons/css/boxicons.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
<link as="style" href="assets/BizLand/assets/vendor/owl.carousel/assets/owl.carousel.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
<link as="style" href="assets/BizLand/assets/vendor/venobox/venobox.css" rel="stylesheet" />
<link as="style" href="assets/BizLand/assets/vendor/aos/aos.css" rel="stylesheet" />

<!-- Template Main CSS File -->
<link as="style" href="assets/BizLand/assets/css/style.css" rel="stylesheet">

<!-- =======================================================
* Template Name: BizLand - v1.0.1
* Template URL: https://bootstrapmade.com/bizland-bootstrap-business-template/
* Author: BootstrapMade.com
* License: https://bootstrapmade.com/license/
======================================================== -->
<style>
  @import url("https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/cookieconsent@3/build/cookieconsent.min.css");

  [data-path^="blog"], .blog-container, [data-path="all-products"], [data-doctype="Item Group"], [data-doctype="Item"] {
    width: 60vw !important;  
    margin: auto !important;
    max-width: 100% !important;
  }
  body {
    font-family: Raleway !important;  
  }
  .btn-login-area {
    visibility: hidden;
  }
  .navbar-toggler {
    padding: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
  }
  body > .navbar {
    height: 40px;
    background: #f7f8f9 !important;
  }
  p.font-italic span {
    color: dark-grey;
    font-weight: 600;
  } 
  h3 span, h5 span {
    color: #106eea;
    font-weight: 900;  
  }
  .page-content-wrapper {
    margin-top: -10px;
  }
  @media only screen and (max-width: 992px) {
    [data-path^="blog"], .blog-container, [data-path="all-products"], [data-doctype="Item Group"], [data-doctype="Item"] {
      width: 90vw !important;  
    }      
    body > .shadow-sm {
      background-color: lightblue;
      visibility: hidden;
    }
    .navbar .container .navbar-brand {
      /*visibility: hidden;*/
    }
  }
  .page-content-wrapper {
    margin-top: -10px;
  }
  .page-content-wrapper > .container{
    padding: 0px;
    max-width:100%;
    width: 100vw;
  }
  .page-content-wrapper > .container > .page-container{
    max-width: 100%;
  }

  /* ERPNext web-footer */
  .web-footer .footer-bottom-line .footer-powered > a{
    visibility: hidden;
  }
  .web-footer .footer-bottom-line .footer-powered > a::after{
    content: "powered by ERPNext";
    visibility: visible;
  }
  .web-footer {
    padding: 0 !important;
    min-height: 0px !important;
    height: 0px;
    margin-top: 5px;
  }
  .web-footer section{
    padding:15px;
    margin: 0;
    height: auto;
    margin-top: -50px;
  }
  [data-path=""] .web-footer {
    margin-top: -50px;  
  }

  /* data-doctype="Web Form" */
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .btn-light {
    visibility: hidden;
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .card-body {
    padding: 3;
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .card {
    margin: 1 !important;
    font-family: Raleway !important;
    border: none !important;
    color: black !important;
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] div .page-breadcrumbs {
    visibility: hidden; 
    height: 0;
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .control-label {
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    margin-bottom: 3px !important;
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] input[data-fieldname="time_log"],
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] input[data-fieldname="index"],
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] input[data-fieldname="item_code"],
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] input[data-fieldname="employee"],
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] input[data-fieldname="company"]
  {
    font-size: 6pt !important;  
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] {
    margin: auto !important;
    width: 60vw !important;
    margin-top: 40px !important;
    font-size: 12pt;
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .page-header h2 {
    margin: 0 !important;
    margin-top: 10px !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    font-size: 18pt;
    color: #4682B4 !important;
    /*visibility: hidden;*/
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .my-5 {
    margin-top: 35px !important;  
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .modal-dialog {
    max-width: 60vw !important;
    margin-top: 40px !important;
    font-size: 12pt;
  }
  @media only screen and (max-width: 768px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio:0) {
    [data-doctype="Web Form"] .card-img-overlay {
      display: none !important;
    }  
    [data-doctype="Web Form"] {
      margin: auto !important;
      width: 84vw !important;
      margin-top: 45px !important;
      font-size: 12pt;
    }
    [data-doctype="Web Form"] .page-header h2 {
      font-size: 12pt;
  }
    [data-doctype="Web Form"] .my-5 {
      margin-top: 10px !important;  
    }
    [data-doctype="Web Form"] .page-header-actions-block button .ml-2 {
     float: right !important;
    }
    [data-doctype="Web Form"] .modal-dialog {
      max-width: 100vw !important;
      margin-top: 10px !important;
      font-size: 11pt;
    }
    [data-doctype="Web Form"] .form-page .section-body {
      padding: 1px !important;
    }
    [data-doctype="Web Form"] .form-control {
      height: 100% !important;
      padding: 1px !important;    
      margin-bottom: 0 !important;    
    }
    [data-doctype="Web Form"] .form-group label {
      margin-bottom: 0 !important;
    }
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .web-form-footer {
    margin-top: 10px !important;    
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .text-right .footer-button.hide {
    display: inline !important;
    height: 30px !important;
  }
  [data-doctype="Web Form"] .modal-backdrop.fade.in{
    opacity: 0 !important;
    z-index: -10;
  }
}
</style>
name: Website Settings
